item.title: Sheepy: A Short Adventure
item.description:
About This Game

Help Sheepy, an abandoned plushy brought to life, as he explores a forgotten and broken world. Sheepy: A Short Adventure is the first short game from MrSuicideSheep.

An Original Soundtrack

Weaved into the world is an incredible original soundtrack created by Seeking Blue artists Yoe Mase, Hahlweg and Tal Richards (formerly of Echos), currently in development.


Mailing List

Join the Mailing List and be the first to learn about the future of Sheepy, limited edition merch and more.

item.title: EXIT KUN
item.description:
About This Game

This game is a game of finding differences and observing. Our game challenges players to carefully observe and spot the distinctions that lead them to the elusive "Exit KUN."

Game Overview:

You find yourself trapped in an enigmatic underground labyrinth, and your only goal is to reach "Exit KUN." The journey demands keen observation of your surroundings. Every detail matters, and anomalies could be your key to progress.

How to Play:

Observe Carefully: Scrutinize your surroundings to uncover anomalies that may guide your way or pose a threat.
Turn Back if Needed: If anomalies are detected, swift decision-making is crucial. Turn back immediately to avoid unforeseen consequences.
Forward Momentum: Should your observation reveal no anomalies, press forward.


Developer Notes:
This game is inspired by Exit 8. You are free to create, upload, and monetize videos and any other content featuring Game on platforms such as YouTube, Twitch, and other video-sharing websites. The characters, places, and elements involved in the game are fictitious. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or events is purely coincidental.

item.title: NodeLord
item.description:
About This Game

You've probably automated factories on alien planets many times, but have you ever automated a settlement of alcoholic dwarves?



Extract, create, process. And most of all - survive!

Three game modes:
  • Story: Discover the fate of the dwarves and face various challenges.
  • Endless: Defeat countless enemy units. How long will you survive?
  • Sandbox: Ground is for good fun without limits!



Did you know that you can make a bomb with magic powder and a pot? The fruit ground in the mill creates a puree - and hence the way to moonshine. There are so many things to discover!




A close clash with a troll cannot end well, especially for small creatures such as dwarves. A tall structure called a tower comes to the rescue. You can drop almost anything on enemy heads.
  • Can you throw a stone? You can.
  • Can you throw an axe? You can.
  • Can you throw a goat? Of course you can! The question is - is it worth it.


This and many other clever mechanisms coming soon!

item.title: Parts Unknown 2024
item.description:
About This Game

Parts Unknown is an online fighting game aiming to recapture the spirit of old fighting games with a unique style. It gives the player different fighting styles to master. If you loved games like Def Jam Vendetta, Street Fighter, Ready 2 Rumble Boxing, or The Warriors, then you are sure to love this game.

Inspired by classic street fighting games like Def Jam Fight For NY, Parts Unknown combines stylish in depth fighting styles, beautiful music, and an online experience to keep you engaged.

Parts Unknown is a third person fighting game innovating ReadyPlayerMe technology to create a metaverse experience. Play as an orphan who has to fight for a reputation in order to save the orphanage you will meet different characters and crews along your journey!

The game in its current state features 3 open worlds, a gym to workout, different fighting styles, and autosave. Online Multiplayer is now available.

item.title: Biomeinoes
item.description:
About This Game

In Biomeinoes, you place randomly drawn domino tiles one by one on a grid â€” you only have a handful of tiles, and the game ends when you run out.

When connected, the edges of these tiles form regions of the game's biomes in the isometric plane:

If you finish such a region of one biome (larger than 1x1), you earn 1 bonus tile for every unit of area it contains. You can also build up huge scores by completing larger and larger areas!

For most biomes, completing 4 whole regions unlocks another biome.

Features

  • Every playthrough is different
  • Enormous skill ceiling
  • 2530 tiles to discover and collect
  • 48 Steam achievements
  • Time trials
  • Daily challenges
  • Unlockable extras
  • Global Steam leaderboards for every game mode
  • Over an hour of beautiful, uniquely relaxing original music by Mark Bondar
  • Robust rank system to record and compare skill levels, from beginner to grandmaster
  • Steam cloud support
  • Multiple save slots

item.title: Cellfish
item.description:
About This Game

In this survivor-like, roguelite experience you are a cell collecting food in the deep ocean. Use your abilities to fight for your life as more and more enemy cells close in on you. Evolve by collecting food, and gain upgrades that will make you and your abilities stronger.

Features:
  • A randomized experience: Every run is new and unique.
  • Unlock new abilities: Each ability will change your playstyle drastically.
  • Character customization: With unlockable skins and body parts, will you make your cell look fearsome, cute, or derpy?
  • Unique opponents: Enemies and bosses each have their own challenging attack patterns that you must learn to avoid in order to survive.

item.title: Fire Race
item.description:
About This Game

Fire Race is a racing game that demands precision! Embark on a world tour, competing to secure the first-place while navigating banana peels, piles of sand, dangerous ice stalactites, and much more!



Looking for an extra challenge? Attempt to collect all the items and complete special quests in each level!



Although the path is challenging, a dose of power-ups can make all the difference. Utilize them to confront opponents and secure your victory!

item.title: Spirit Summoner
item.description:
About This Game


Spirit Summoner is 3D Real-time strategy attack enemy defense with upgradable summoned units. You play as Spirit Summoner that can summon creature to destroy enemy defence. Upgrade summoned unit during game and plan the attack to succesfully break human defense. Summoned unit is weak, fragile, and unarmed at start but you can unlock more powerful unit later in game. you pick 3 units each game and plan your strategy to break armed human unit and defence. You fight modern human defence with zombie summoned unit.

item.title: Sippy Disco: Light Up the Dance Floor
item.description:
About This Game

Sippy Disco is a relaxing game where you light up disco tiles to complete each dance floor. As the game progresses, you will encounter different tiles and characters that can both help and hinder your progress. The fewer moves you make, the higher your score.

Features
  • Customize your unicorn

  • Unwind by lighting up the dance floor in a stress-free environment

  • Chill with a groovy disco soundtrack

  • Be inspired by inspirational quotes from Sippy the Unicorn

item.title: Paint by Cubes
item.description:
About This Game


Paint by Cubes is a colorful puzzle solving game. Take control of a painting cube and move in 4 possible directions, where each direction is locked to a particular color. Enter a field from a direction with a matching color to paint it and initiate special mechanics connected to it.

Start with simple levels consisting of 3 or 5 fields and watch as the difficulty increases as you progress through the more and more complex mechanics. Unlock new painting mechanics and carefully think about each step, as any misdirection may lead to a series of incorrectly matched paint colors.

MOVE TO PAINT

The basic gameplay starts with a simple 4-directional movement. It may sound simple, but with each step taken your cube will spread a color related to the direction taken. Analyze the game area and plan your steps ahead as a wrong decision made at a crossing may cost you a series of excessive steps to fix it.

100 COLORFUL LEVELS TO COMPLETE

Start your adventure with levels requiring just a couple simple steps to complete and watch as the difficulty increases with your progress. Unlock new painting mechanics - from fields painting all row when you step on them, to unlockable gates blocking your progress and teleporters that make unpacking the level's layouts even more difficult.


Test your skills in special, challenging levels, where you're limited by move limits or take control of multiple coloring cubes at once. Will you manage to finish them all?

item.title: Street Fighting Simulator
item.description:
About This Game

Street Fighting Simulator - This is a dynamic fighting game with a side view. You have six levels and eleven characters to choose from. The goal of the game is always the same - you must get to the end of the level and destroy everyone who gets in your way.

Game Features


  • Epic combat system: arm kick, leg kick, block, sprawl kick.



  • Atmospheric locations: garages, courtyard, disco in the style of the eighties, hospital.



  • Training level: here you can learn basic moves and pray to the holy capybara.

item.title: Intra
item.description:
About This Game

Finally towers fall in a tower defense game.
Intra-Tower Defense presents its player with vast strategy elements.

Key Features:
  • Skill Combos: There is 20+ upgradable skills you can pick and make impressive combos.

  • Enemies have specific behaviour: Some enemies choose the safest route. Others attack certain towers first. Some enemies can be easily provokable. Some enemies make smart moves. Learn the behavior of the enemies and defend your base tower.

  • Plenty of Enemy Genre: There is a lot of different kind of enemy. And every enemy has different behavior. Explore those behaviors and defend yourself accordingly.

  • Destructable Towers: IntraTD has very dynamic gameplay. Towers can be crushed by enemies. Inspect the level's tricks and finesse side and build your strategy.

  • Strategic Range: Every enemy and tower has a different vertical and horizontal attack range.

  • Tower Upgrades: Every tower has its own specific upgrades. Also, there are a lot of general upgrades which affect all towers. Choose the best tower upgrade according to your economy and strategy style.

  • Hex-grid Levels: No confusion in a good strategy and tower defense game. Hex-grid makes levels more understandable. Allows you to plan accordingly.

  • EPIC BOSSES: These game's bosses are legends and for sure they will surprise you.

  • Look and Feel: Levels are designed to balance intelligibility and atmosphere. If you're looking at a view from above, why not look at something beautiful?

  • Story Telling: Intra was a chosen one. You will watch Intra's story while playing a unique strategy tower defense game.

General:
Unlike the other tower defense game, Intra Tower Defense has a height difference, skill combos, smart enemies and destroyable towers. Intra-Tower Defense also presents players with a good cinematic experience.

  • Level Designs: Every level is unique and atmospheric. Levels are also highly replayable. You can choose your skills and upgrades again and play it again. But remember, enemies won't respond like before.

  • There is two tower upgrades section. One is inside the game: These upgrades are specific to that tower.
    General upgrades affect every tower. Choose your way and build your strategy style.

  • Clear Game Tutorials: Intra-Tower Defense have a lot of game mechanic but with clear explanations, you will understand all of them.

  • You can also see information about towers and enemies in the book section.

item.title: Brushwood Saga
item.description:
About This Game



Brushwood Saga is a High Fantasy Role Playing Game (RPG) made in RPG Maker MV. Using familiar turn-based combat with intricate mana and stamina systems, you'll get to explore a wide world of wonders beset by rampaging monsters, vile cults, and war, with certain choices made along the way that may affect how your story ends. Play as Lyle Brushwood, the son of a legendary hero with a personality as sweet and charming as he is naive and lightheaded. Join up with eccentric companions and take down greater evils, strengthening the bonds between yourself and your newfound comrades.

This Game Features:

  • 12 hours of RPG Gameplay
  • Challenging bonus dungeons
  • 7 playable characters
  • Damage Element System, with different enemies vulnerable to different attacks
  • Over 100 different types of enemies!]

item.title: Pixel Fixel
item.description:
About This Game

ğŸŸ¥ğŸŸ¥ğŸŸ¥ğŸŸ¥ğŸŸ¥ğŸŸ§ğŸŸ§ğŸŸ§ğŸŸ§ğŸŸ§ğŸŸ¨ğŸŸ¨ğŸŸ¨ğŸŸ¨ğŸŸ¨ğŸŸ©ğŸŸ©ğŸŸ©ğŸŸ©ğŸŸ©ğŸŸ¦ğŸŸ¦ğŸŸ¦ğŸŸ¦ğŸŸ¦ğŸŸªğŸŸªğŸŸªğŸŸªğŸŸª

Stay a while and relax! Pixel Fixel promises to provide as much relaxing color-matching gameplay as you desire! There are no in-app purchases, advertisements, or any other gimmicks! Totally free, and totally rewarding!

The player is tasked with restoring a mixed-color gradient to its former glory! This helps train the player's eyes to color and provides a soothing and fulfilling feeling.

  • Enjoy hundreds of levels
  • Create your own levels
  • Play against your friends in online 1v1 matches. Fastest to solve the puzzle, wins!

ğŸŸ¥ğŸŸ¥ğŸŸ¥ğŸŸ¥ğŸŸ¥ğŸŸ§ğŸŸ§ğŸŸ§ğŸŸ§ğŸŸ§ğŸŸ¨ğŸŸ¨ğŸŸ¨ğŸŸ¨ğŸŸ¨ğŸŸ©ğŸŸ©ğŸŸ©ğŸŸ©ğŸŸ©ğŸŸ¦ğŸŸ¦ğŸŸ¦ğŸŸ¦ğŸŸ¦ğŸŸªğŸŸªğŸŸªğŸŸªğŸŸª

item.title: Utter Takedown
item.description:
About This Game

GET INVOLVED!

ABOUT THIS GAME

Utter Takedown is a gripping top-down tactical hard-core stealth game set in the 2000s. You play as a former hitman who has left the local mafia, only to have his family threatened as retaliation. Now, it's up to you to take down the mafia and save your loved ones. With a variety of interactive tools and weapons at your disposal - from knifes and tasers to cameras and toggles - you'll need to use all of your wits and strategic thinking to succeed.

The game features a diverse range of maps, each with its own unique challenges and obstacles to overcome. As you progress, you'll encounter different types of AI with varying levels of difficulty, adding an extra layer of complexity to the gameplay. Along the way, you'll need to solve puzzles, gather intel, and outsmart your enemies to stay one step ahead.

Utter Takedown offers a thrilling and immersive gaming experience. With its combination of action, strategy, and puzzle-solving, it's the perfect game for anyone who loves a challenge. So gear up, get ready, and prepare to make an utter mafia takedown.

item.title: Russian Soul Simulator
item.description:
About This Game

The main character is a man in love with nature, and he has a camera to photograph beautiful places and animals. The player can choose the angle and photograph various objects - flowers, trees, birds, animals and other animals that can be found in the Russian nature.



Realistic graphics allows you to see every detail and creates an atmosphere of complete merging with nature. It depends on the player what moments he wants to capture on his photos. He can search for the most beautiful and unique landscapes, follow the behavior of animals to capture unique moments.

The game has no specific goals or objectives. It is simply designed to help the player to relax, unwind and enjoy the nature on the screen. The musical accompaniment adds to the atmosphere and helps to create an immersive gameplay experience.

Russian Soul Simulator is designed to show the beauty of Russian nature and its uniqueness. It can be an inspiration for those who want to take a break from the hustle and bustle of city life and satiate themselves with the beauty and tranquility of nature.

item.title: Travel Along
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome to Travel Along, a hidden object game where you collect stamps, postcards and coins while searching objects around the world! With 3 game modes and puzzles between the chapters, Travel Along will provide hours of fun for Hidden Object fans in enchanting locations. Souvenir shop, photo album and passport full of stamps are waiting to be filled through

item.title: Grand Prix Rock 'N Racing
item.description:
About This Game

Grand Prix Rock 'N Racing gives you the fastest, most exciting races. You can evolve your car, improving the engine, brakes, tires and more until you've achieved the perfect evolution to win the Championship!

Online leader board where you can compare your best times with those of your friends and players from around the world.

Features:

- Wide variety of tracks.
- Multi-player with 4 players.
- Races with 20 opponents.
- Realistic driving physics.
- Lots of Rock 'N Roll music.

item.title: VoxelScaper
item.description:
About This Game

This is a diorama-style game designed purely to let you express your creativity. With its simple and intuitive interface, you can build a floating city in the sky, a lush garden oasis, or a whimsical fairytale scene. Start with a glass cube with water on a table and let your creativity run wild.

To make your world even more beautiful, you can decorate it with items such as:
  • Flowers
  • Fountains
  • Trees
  • Different light sources
  • Trash bins
  • Benches, and more

Of course, the game has characters and animals to mimic a real-life world.

No goals or objectives, get creative and build your perfect mini-world.

Voxelscaper is inspired by games like:
  • Townscapers
  • Islanders

item.title: Demolish & Build 3 Prologue
item.description:
About This Game

ğŸ—ï¸ Click to join the crew


Demolish & Build 3 will include brand new demolition and driving physics.
This tech demo will allow you to try them out for free before the final release!

Demolish & Build 3: Prologue will include the first few missions of the full game and features

ğŸš§ Large excavator.
ğŸš§ Skid steer.
ğŸš§ Attachments
ğŸš§ Physics-based track mechanics,
ğŸš§ Vehicle controls based on real machines.
ğŸš§ Full controller support,
ğŸš§ Fully destructible objects and structures
ğŸš§ Third-person and first-person camera modes,



What after the prologue? Max torque forward towards the main game release where we will bring even more...



and



Stay tuned for upcoming news and rumors from the construction site by adding our game to your Wishlist. Thanks in advance!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1203670/Demolish__Build_3/

item.title: Toward the Moon
item.description:
About This Game

From ancient historical periods to embarking on a journey through space by leaping, encountering different locations with different obstacles can add excitement to your excitement.
PURPOSE
To reach the top as soon as possible by trying different paths and overcoming different obstacles.
LOCATION
Encounter structures from ancient historical periods, modern-day buildings, and finally space age structures.
CONTROLS
Use both keyboard and mouse, as well as joystick for easy controls to reach the goal more excitingly.
OBSTACLES AND CHALLENGES
Discover new obstacles, leap over gaps, and climb walls strategically while passing each level. It's not just about being fast to succeed. It's about moving smartly and using the shortest path.

item.title: HVRGUN
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome to HVRGUN, the worlds best Assault Pilot Training program. Where you'll be placed directly into a virtual battlefield and test your ability to dodge, shoot, and destroy an endless onslaught of enemies! This program will place you in a variety of environments with an even wider arsenal of weaponry at your disposal, ensuring you're ready for any situation. Of course, you'll have to first prove yourself before you're able to obtain our top tier weaponry.

item.title: æ€è™«å‰‚å°é˜Ÿï¼šè™«æ—äº‰éœ¸Insecticide Troopers:Star zerg
item.description:
About This Game

All plot battles



It's all a survival battle

In different battles, as a heroic lieutenant, you resist the Zerg tide like attacks with soldiers in different positions.

Defending for 25 minutes will determine victory in the game, but this is not an easy task, it is something that must be done by you.

So use the heavy machine gun in your hand and bravely unleash your firepower on the damn Zerg.





â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”

Federal News Express:



Obituary



This year marks the seventeenth year of the federal war with the Zerg.

ã€ Geze 7 ã€‘ A moment of beautiful and rich planet, the best farm planet in the Federation, the highest quality milk and rice producing area in the Federation, especially cigars, which are the favorite of all Federation marshals. But now it has been attacked by the Zerg, and the once beautiful planet has been stained red with blood.

One hour, 100000 people died

In two hours, 300000 people died

Four hundred and seven million people died in twelve hours

This number is still soaring, and humanity is facing an unprecedented crisis. The Federal Command admits that they have wrongly underestimated the Zerg's long-range strike capabilities.

Due to the tragedy on the planet of Goethe 7, the Federal Air Force Lieutenant General responsible for homeland defense resigned. The Air Force Marshal has ordered a space fleet to go to Goethe 7 for rescue, but reinforcements will arrive at least a week later. Can the people on Goethe 7 still hold on for so long.



Federal soldiers are resisting on the planet.

We have weapons!

We have weapons!

We have weapons!

We need warriors!

It is time for the farmers of the federal call for "Goethe 7" to take up weapons and surround their homes like men, rather than waiting for others to save them.

We need warriors, like heroic lieutenants.

We need you!

Your home needs you!

You can obtain citizenship by serving in the military!!!!!!

Join the army now, what are you waiting for.

Continue to fight, victory will belong to the Federation, to all citizens!!!!!

item.title: Dungeon Chamber
item.description:
About This Game


Dungeon Chamber is an action game, with an isometric view and character evolution.
Three playable classes, MAGE, BARBARIAN and ROGUE(DLC).
Acquire exclusive powers and adventure through 10 chambers for each hero.
Unique ranking system for each chamber and hero.
Finish the chamber as quickly as possible and climb the ranks.


Heroes with unique chambers, skills and powers.


Dungeons led by the legendary skeleton wizard, MASTER KAY!
MASTER KAY controls fire and ice.


Chambers full of powerful enemy skeletons, who don't like your presence.
Skeletons have unique abilities and powers, be careful.


Evolve heroes.
Choose your powers wisely.



Welcome to Dungeon Chamber.

item.title: Code Wizard: Java Edition
item.description:
About This Game

Do you want to learn to code in Java, while playing an RPG and solving puzzles?

Write real code

  • Each puzzle must be solved by writing real Java code which will be compiled and validated.
  • Real code compilation means there are many ways to solve a problem, any valid solution will work
  • Learn faster by writing real code
  • Learn to understand error messages and debug problems.

Solve puzzles

  • Solve over 80 unique programming problems
  • Your answers will change the game world
  • Solve alone or with help

Learn Java features including:

  • Primitive Types
  • Strings
  • Classes & Methods
  • Constructors
  • Instances
  • Conditionals
  • Loops
  • Arrays
  • Lists
  • Exception handling

Learn Object Oriented Programming concepts

  • Inheritance
  • Encapsulation
  • Polymorphism

item.title: Live Cam Simulator
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome.

First, there is nothing you need to do in this game.

The camera in this game will continue to capture the scenery of some place that is not here.
Animals may or may not appear.

Time will continue to pass while you are working on your PC.
Place this game at the edge of your desktop and enjoy the passage of time.

item.title: Void Gore
item.description:
About This Game

Blast through the endless levels of hell!



From the creators of Project Starship comes a new and nightmarish arcade shootâ€™em up experience. Void Gore casts you as an ace pilot descending through the levels of hell and getting rich in the process. Earn coins as you take down supernatural horrors in pulse-pounding vertical scrolling style, then spend them on upgrades to keep yourself alive and prove your skills against online leaderboards!

Survive waves of enemies to reach the next layer of malice and despair, collect power-ups, face increasingly challenging foes and add to your score multiplier as you chain multiple kills. Survive as long as possible and prove your skills as the ultimate pilot. Itâ€™s all just a simulation, after allâ€¦ or is it?



Features:

  • Survive the unpredictable and endless depths of hell!
  • Adapt to each challenge as levels are randomized.
  • Enjoy a classically gritty pixel art style with parallax scrolling.
  • Chain kills to increase your multiplier and shoot for higher scores!
  • Earn coins to spend on critical ship upgrades.
  • Prove your skills against online leaderboards!

item.title: Trappist
item.description:
About This Game

As soon as humanity had the means we sent out an interstellar colony ship. Its design was basic but elegant. And it made it all 40.7 light-years to Trappist-1.

â€” Ship data files

On arrival at Trappist-1 you control the Ark. A large spaceship/movable colony and trading hub for your exploration of Trappist-1.

Trappist is a story-driven colony builder with resource management in the Trappist-1 solar system, and a focus on care-free building and story.

It's easy to play and respectful of your time. You'll create and grow multiple colonies in the Trappist-1 solar system, meet new alien friends and explore the mysteries of Trappist.

Trappist is fully playable from beginning to end and is under active development with more stories, colonies and improvements coming.

Explore the Trappist-1 solar system

Fly through the Trappist-1 solar system and survey each planet to find the best locations for your colonies.

Discover and excavate alien artifacts hidden in the system and uncover the true purpose of Trappist-1.

Build your colonies

Build colonies on the planets and moons of Trappist-1. Each colony has distinct resources and buildings that are necessary for success.

Fill your cargo ships with the extracted resources and fly them to your manufacturing or population centers. Create automated trading routes for stable production chains across your colonies.

Fly your Ark as a mobile colony or place it strategically as your central trading hub.

Current features

  • Relaxing gameplay
  • Freely explore the Trappist-1 solar system
  • Meaningful progress even in short game sessions
  • Multiple storylets woven into the main story line about the nature of Trappist-1
  • 10-15 hours or more to finish all current stories
  • 6 distinct colony sites (the Ark, two planets and two moons)
  • More than 40 different buildings
  • Over two dozen construction and consumption resources
  • Replace your workforce with robots
  • Place buildings on a grid or go gridless at the flip of a switch!
  • No money and no road placement, just base building without unnecessary distractions
  • Automated trade routes between your colonies and the Ark
  • Quick to start and no loading screens when switching between colonies
  • Cheat codes and console commands
  • (Skippable) tutorials to explain the controls and game play
  • Different starting conditions. Including a New Game+ where you can start a new game and continue with your customized Ark from a completed game.

Planned features and continued development

These are some of the features I hope to implement:

  • More colonizable planets
  • More aliens
  • More research projects
  • Improved models and sound effects

Trappist is under active development. But as a solo developer I can't guarantee everything will be implemented, or will be implemented to an extent you might want or expect. I recommend you consider purchasing this game based on its current state alone.

Controls

  • Keyboard and mouse
  • Left-click to select, right-click to give orders
  • Move the camera with wasd or arrow keys, moving the mouse to the screen edges or click-and-drag
  • Touchscreen, including drag and pinch-to-zoom
  • Tutorial and documentation are available from within the game

item.title: Slot Advanture
item.description:
About This Game

Get rid of monsters you meet while exploring Dungeon and earn various rewards.



You can move the map by selecting the blocks around charactor. Clearing the boss room will allow you to proceed to the next step.

Explore Dungeon with your own route.

Character

All of the character's ability values except physical strength are randomly applied.



Slot

All characters and monsters need to get a high hit rate in the slot to attack each other.

If you're lucky, you can pick a good hit rate and do fatal damage.

But if you're unlucky, you won't be able to defeat the monster.

A treasure room and sanctuary

Enjoy your adventure comfortably by finding a treasure room where you can get a variety of items and a sanctuary
where you can get a good buff.

The most important thing in this game is luck. Trust your click skills.

item.title: The Mobius Machine
item.description:
About This Game

Carve your path through a vast alien world filled with brutal lifeforms and malfunctioning machines.
Explore beyond the Crash Site, through the desolate Spaceship Graveyard, into the depths of the Mining Grounds, and up to the Floating Forests.

The Mobius Machine is a classic 2D adventure game with detailed 3D visuals.

Explore Seamlessly

Explore a complex interconnected open world, discovering it your own way.
Stumble upon the breathtaking environments of the Isolaria moon. On land, underwater and in the skies.

Fight

Combat an array of deadly adversaries: the local fauna, infected colonists, and abandoned machines that once worked in the facilities.
Defeat more than 80 distinct enemies, including the epic bosses that guard the most precious gear.

Shoot Anywhere

Designed for both Gamepad or Mouse and Keyboard controls. Run and jump around while shooting in any direction using a tight control system.
You can have 2 weapons equipped at any time, and use them as you need.

Evolve

Acquire the gear that will make you more mobile and unlock new areas. Climb walls, dash, dive underwater, glide through the air and evolve the way you interact with the world.

Upgrade your arsenal

Collect blueprints and craft new weapons and upgrades in order to fight more effectively. Each new item you acquire will give you more options and increase your chances of survival.

item.title: Ice Fighter
item.description:
About This Game

Ice Fighter is a fun Tower Defense-like game where you protect and grow your campfire, defending it from waves of enemies during the night, and planning your defense during the day.

After cold and dark enemies bring a bonfire to the brink of burning out, you, a small fire with legs, are deployed as a last resort defense against the threats.

You have two weapons: A magma-ball launcher and a flamethrower,
along with two tools: An axe and a pickaxe.

Once the day comes, the enemies melt and you're free to explore the cave, in it, you'll need to gather resources like fuel for your flamethrower or gold, which you can use to buy defenses and upgrades, so the enemies don't extinguish the fire when the sun sets.


Melt enemies with your flamethrower, or shoot them with fireballs.



Explore the cave for resources.



Manage upgrades with the gold you got from mining.



Buy turrets and place them tactically.



Good luck!

item.title: Ghost In The Mirror
item.description:
About This Game

Do you believe in ghosts?
Are you ready to be scared?!
... Well, then I think you've got the wrong game.

Seriously, I started off with the darkest intentions, wanting to create a horror game, but the urge to laugh took over.
Sure, it's an adventurous game with mysterious elements... However, with constant fourth-wall breaks, irony, jokes, and vulgarity, you tend to forget about ghosts!



Let me introduce myself, I'm Sui!
I'm Italian, and I'm a solo indie developer.
I've dedicated myself so much to this project that I've ended up inside it in flesh and pixels.
Sitting behind my desk, I will narrate the events and guide you by the hand through this journey...



...A journey that will keep you glued to the screen from the first to the last episode.
Yes, you heard right, EPISODES!
Ghost In The Mirror is an anthology of graphic adventures.
A series of ghost stories characterized by a lot of storytelling, puzzles, and wild humor.
A collection of modern adventure games that still capture the spirit of the '90s games.



This is "Here Be Dragons", the first episode of the saga.
In this adventure I'll take you to the 18th century, and together we'll experience the adventures of Roger, a morally dubious boy on the run from the law.
A journey that starts in a pirate village, with light puzzles and comedic moments, but will take us adrift at sea, surrounded by mystery, ghosts, and...
...Well, I don't like to reveal too much about the plot, so that's enough!



But I can tell you what characterizes this and all the other episodes of Ghost In The Mirror:
You'll guide characters from different eras through a 2D world with an unprecedented depth.
You'll explore evocative pixel-art scenarios and handcrafted animations, immersing yourself in gripping stories, all connected by the eerie thread that unites the worlds of the living and the dead.
You'll solve intricate puzzles and meta-puzzles like in a classic point-and-click game.
You'll visit places rich in interactive elements and talk to the quirky characters that populate them.
You'll collect items necessary to progress in the game, which, if used creatively, might reveal the programmer's sheer foolishness.
Your choices will determine the outcome of the adventures, offering a personalized and replayable gaming experience.
Prepare to be carried away by an original and thrilling soundtrack that will plunge you into the game's atmosphere.
Unlock your potential through a series of exciting achievements, revealing your skill and dedication.
Get Ghost In The Mirror and let yourself be captivated by an epic adventure!







Specters, spirits, ghosts, poltergeists, ectoplasms...
Throughout history, we've come up with many names for them, and countless people swear they've seen one.
Do you believe in ghosts?
Here's what we'll do: you'll answer me directly in the game.

Have fun, and happy nightmares!

Play comfortably using touchscreen, keyboard, mouse, or controller, tailoring the gaming experience to your personal preferences

Available languages: English and Italian (Others will be added later)

item.title: Stickman World Battle
item.description:
About This Game

Stickman World Battle - a new exciting and thrilling real-time strategy game with the famous stickman heroes! RTS game in a modern setting with survival elements. You can control your army and individual warriors.

Mine oil to hire more warriors for your army. At your disposal: engineer, stickman warrior, machine gunner, flamethrower, robot, tank and even helicopter. Upgrade your army by improving your stickmen's skills and weapons. Strengthen your military base. Prepare for the legendary battle of stickmen. The outcome of the battle depends only on you.

Campaign Mode. Go on an exciting stickman adventure in campaign mode. Capture new lands ranging from Asia, Europe to the Wild West. Immerse yourself in the era of modern battles and the legacy of great civilizations. Defend your base from the onslaught of enemy troops stickmen, tanks and fighters. Siege the enemy tower and destroy it to win. Apply unique tactics for each battle and location. More than 50 unique missions are waiting for you!

Survival Mode. Bonus survival mode will allow you to take part in an endless battle. Earn points to upgrade your soldiers and tower. Manage your resources properly to survive. You must survive as long as possible from the onslaught of enemy warriors.

Online mode. Fight with players from all over the world or friends online. Show whose stickman army is cooler.

Stickman World Battle game features:

  • A lot of new game locations and levels
  • New design that will please all fans of stickman games!
  • Unique and new characters
  • Stunning graphics
  • Large selection of game modes
  • Upgrade your army and units
  • Bonus levels
  • Amazing stunts and animations!
  • HD graphics
  • Exclusive soundtrack
  • Hardcore gameplay

item.title: Korean Rail Driving Tour-LRT Uijeongbu
item.description:
About This Game

This game is a railroad simulation game that allows you to experience actual railroad operation based on video footage of the driving direction of an actual train.

Anyone can enjoy the feeling of being a train driver just by operating the accelerator and brakes.

Enjoy â€œrealâ€ video of Koreaâ€™s beautiful scenery!
Experience the Uijeongbu light rail train with a live-action video!
The stage of this work takes place on the Uijeongbu Light Rail train, which operates in the northern area of Seoul, the capital of Korea.
The train runs through 15 stations and the total length of the line is 11.4 km.
High-definition video faithfully reproduces the atmosphere of real life and provides a powerful sense of immersion in the game.
You can feel like you are a real train driver with smooth, realistic video playback.
Huge volume! You can enjoy the entire Uijeongbu light rail line multiple times in both forward and reverse directions!
It supports three play modes: sectional driving mode, overall driving mode, and view mode driving.
Visit the northern part of Seoul, South Korea anytime from home!
Optimized for PC.
Keyboard input and controller operation are supported.
Enjoy the train driving experience as well as the outdoor scenery of Korea's northern region.

item.title: My life as a cat
item.description:
About This Game

"My life as a cat" is a relaxing, slow-paced visual novel about longing for something different than the modern society and searching back to nature. It has AI-generated oil paintings to illustrate the fully voiced and texted story as you progress through it according to your choices.

Will you have what it takes to survive out in the wilderness, or will you steer towards a not-so-favorable ending?

item.title: Dino Park
item.description:
About This Game

Join the Discord to vote on which Dinosaurs are coming next!



Discover new dinosaurs in booster packs!



Feed your dinosaurs to increase their income and sale value!



Breed your dinosaurs together to discover super rare variants!



Upgrade your park at the shop!



Can you collect them all?

item.title: Of Murder and Moonshine
item.description:
About This Game



Youâ€™re a hitman in one of the top three crime organizations fighting to the death over territory and the flow of illegal booze. Itâ€™s your job to follow orders and come out alive on the other side, no matter how risky, how brutal, or how unlikely it might seem that youâ€™ll reach your mark. Jump, slide, sneak, or just barge right in â€“ youâ€™ll have to do whatever it takes to get the kill.





As, Of Murder and Moonshineâ€™s pixel art and dark, jazzy score give the game a gritty, nostalgic feel to punctuate the systematic killings you must carry out throughout cities and the bayou in order to appease your boss and ensure your crime syndicate comes out on top at all costs.

Features:
Choose your weapon
Start each level by choosing your preferred tool of the trade. From tommy guns to baseball bats, thereâ€™s a strategic choice for every situation.


Survey the task ahead or run in guns blazing
Depending on the scenario, you may employ a careful, covert operation where you survey the scene and plan out each step, or you may find yourself thrown right to the wolves and need to fight your way out from the inside. Either way, you have to take out your mark or find yourself on the wrong end of the barrel of a gun.





Hide your intentions for covert hits
Alternate between brandishing your weapon and keeping it discreetly concealed in your overcoat to suit the situation at hand. Youâ€™ll never get to your mark and have an opportunity to take him down if you get stopped at the door by guards who see your intentions a mile away.


Expect to suffer for your mistakes
When you answer to the most ambitious crime boss the city has ever seen, you canâ€™t expect to get any slack for sloppy work. The jobs youâ€™re sent on are punishing, and youâ€™ll pay with your life if you donâ€™t succeed, but that risk is what makes victory taste all that much sweeter.


Take down killer bosses
When youâ€™re part of a crime ring, itâ€™s not only your own boss you need to worry about. Use what youâ€™ve learned taking out lesser goons to bring down the big baddiesâ€”rival crime bosses who will do anything it takes to put an end to your mission. Boss fights mean tougher battles and bigger wins, so youâ€™ll have to make use of new strategies, like employing molotov cocktails or honing your sniping skills, to take them down. Will you and your gang be able to conquer the swamps and the city, or will a rival crew bring you to your knees?

item.title: Shoot the Robots VR
item.description:
About This Game

Good old 'shoot-em-all' returns, now in VR! Now in futuristic environment filled by robots, drones and flying cars!

In this fast-paced game you have to shoot the running robots, who try escape your gun-point in any way: running, jumping, crawling, riding cars. Take your favourite pistol into your hand, and enjoy sophisticated animations of how robots fall from your well-aimed shots

Key game features:
- Super enjoyable robots death animations
- Futuristic city environment
- A lot of 'Mods' to customize your game experience in radical way
